mapper.sql: id, app_id, app_accesskey, admin_role_name, memo, index_url, login_url, login_enable, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into ta_app (id, app_id, app_accesskey, admin_role_name, memo, index_url, login_url, login_enable, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appAccesskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=com.alibaba.tesla.common.mybatis.TeslaDateTypeHandler}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=com.alibaba.tesla.common.mybatis.TeslaDateTypeHandler})
mapper.update: update ta_app set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_accesskey = #{appAccesskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_role_name = #{adminRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, index_url = #{indexUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_url = #{loginUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_enable = #{loginEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=com.alibaba.tesla.common.mybatis.TeslaDateTypeHandler} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
